text:
We had a fantastic dining experience at Curry & Kimchi Lounge, thanks to the generous invitation from the owner! The fusion menu was impressive, with dishes that seamlessly blended flavors from different cultures. Our kids loved the variety of options, and my wife and I enjoyed the creative twists on classic dishes.

The service was warm and attentive, adding to the overall warmth of the evening. We're grateful for the hospitality and can't wait to return!

Highly recommend for families and foodies alike.

It's a unique concept. Great food and environment.

Food first class with the outdoor environment.
The food was incredible. All was good. We loved to dine in here again.
I'm really feel happy and satisfied with their service on my son birthday party.. Food are so delicious. Recommend. üëçüëçüëç
I would love to eat here again. To be honest, the food is good & the atmosphere is nice and comfortable. First time I tasted Indian Korean fusion food. I would definitely recommend to others.
